concept.title: AF PGI 5315.404-70-90 DD Form 1547, Record of Weighted Guidelines Method Application, Report Control Symbol: DD-AT&L(Q)1751

conbody.p: See the WGL User's Guide for additional information on how to analyze profit and prepare a DD Form 1547 .
